feed.title: Ali Abolhassanzadeh Mahani
feed.subtitle: The words of a wanderer in a world filled with unanswered questions. I choose whatever piques my interest and try to learn about it.

entry.title: My First Post
entry.summary: Hello! This is me! I finally setup my Github-pages and can start writing stuff as I please. Let’s try some Math and code. First is the Math. The Poisson Distribution equation is \begin{equation} f(k; \lambda) = \frac{\lambda^{k}e^{-\lambda}}{k!} \end{equation} And now a piece of code: class Human: def __init__(self): self.name = "Ali A. Mahani" self.birthday = "Feb. 25" ...
